item.title: Wall Street ticks modestly higher as markets await the Fed's last interest rate call of 2025
item.description: Wall Street leaned toward tiny gains ahead of a two-day meeting of the Federal Reserve, where officials will make a decision on where to take the cent...

item.title: UN says world must jointly tackle issues of climate change, pollution, biodiversity and land loss
item.description: The United Nations says the world needs a new way of thinking about environmental crises threatening the health of people and the planet

item.title: More people crowdfunded for essential needs in 2025, according to GoFundMe's year-end report
item.description: More people are turning to GoFundMe for help with basic needs such as housing and food

item.title: Federal Reserve set to cut rate but may signal a pause to come
item.description: The Federal Reserve faces an unusually contentious meeting this week that will test Chair Jerome Powell’s ability to corral the necessary support from...

item.title: Chinese premier cites damage from US tariffs, as surplus surpasses $1 trillion
item.description: China's premier says higher tariffs have dealt a “severe blow” to the world economy, even as China's own trade surplus has surged past $1 trillion
